ComicInfo.Summary:
Double Trouble Cross!: Reggie spoils Moose's surprise party by telling Moose that he's seen Midge with Archie.
The Culprit: Reggie offers to uncover who threw a rock through the Lodges' window, but it's all a ploy to take Veronica out on a date because Archie saw Reggie throw the rock.
The Old Bawl Game: Archie learns that Veronica is sick and races to her side, barreling into Betty in the process. Betty and Reggie decide to get back at the two lovebirds by putting onion juice in Veronica's vaporizer, which causes both Veronica and Archie to bawl uncontrollably.
Toss and Turn: Reggie's efforts to take Archie's place on a date with Veronica backfire, resulting in her being angry with both boys.
Foxy Proxy: Reggie tricks Archie into going to an awards ceremony as his substitute so that he can take Veronica to a dance, but things get confusing when the other teens are all acting as each other's substitutes for one thing or another.
Joker's Wild!: Jughead sets up the ultimate practical joke on Reggie -- Reggie thinks Jughead is faking a case of the measles, but they're real, and Reggie's been exposed.
Gag Me!: Reggie's practical jokes make everyone want to get back at him, until they hear he's been in an accident and is in the hospital -- but that's just another prank that his cousin, a nurse, helped him pull off.
ComicInfo.Writer: Dan Parent,Frank Doyle,Tom Moore,Frank Doyle,Tom Moore,Dan Parent
ComicInfo.Title: Double Trouble Cross!; The Culprit; The Old Bawl Game; Toss and Turn; Foxy Proxy; Joker's Wild!; Gag Me!
